verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re the one who walked on water And You calmed the raging seas You command the highest mountains To fall upon their knees{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re the one who welcomed sinners And You opened blinded eyes You restored the brokenhearted And You brought the dead to life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Forgetting all our sins You remember all Your promises{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are amazing More than amazing Forever our God You’re more than enough (You are amazing){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With authority You’ve spoken And You’ve set the captive free You’re the King who came to serve And You’re the God who washed our feet You’re the one who took our burdens And You bled upon the cross{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In your kindness and Your mercy You became the way for us{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Forgetting all our sins You remember all Your Promises{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are amazing More than amazing Forever our God You’re more than enough (You are amazing) X2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh how marvelous Oh how wonderful Oh how glorious X4 You are (amazing) (only 1st and 3rd time) 10. You are amazing More than amazing Forever our God You’re more than enough (You are amazing) X2{/lang-eng}
